title: I want to make User interface Simple and Clean
description: As a user, I want a simplified and clean interface so that I can focus on my tasks without visual clutter and navigate efficiently through the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Interface removes unnecessary visual elements and decorations
Navigation is intuitive with clear visual hierarchy
Color scheme uses minimal, consistent palette
Typography is readable with appropriate sizing and spacing
Interactive elements have clear affordances and feedback
Loading states and transitions are smooth and purposeful

acceptanceTests.title: Visual Clutter Reduction
acceptanceTests.description: Verify that unnecessary UI elements are removed
steps: Verify removal of decorative elements that don't serve functional purpose
acceptanceTests.expectedResult: Interface shows only essential elements with clear purpose

acceptanceTests.title: Navigation Clarity
acceptanceTests.description: Ensure navigation is intuitive and well-organized
acceptanceTests.expectedResult: Users can navigate without confusion or multiple attempts

acceptanceTests.title: Consistent Design Language
acceptanceTests.description: Validate consistent use of colors, fonts, and spacing
steps: Audit color usage across all screens
acceptanceTests.expectedResult: Design system is applied consistently throughout interface
